meanings.definition: The curved prominence of cartilage on the outer ear.
meanings.sent1: The anthelix adds a unique shape to the outer ear.
meanings.sent2: She gently touched her anthelix while adjusting her glasses.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten tried to play with the anthelix of the cat statue.
meanings.sent4: His anthelix stood out like a small hill amidst the flat landscape of his ear.
meanings.sent5: The anthelix, like a gentle wave, curved elegantly along the outer ear.

meanings.definition: The fold of skin on the outer ear that runs parallel to the helix.
meanings.sent1: The anthelix can sometimes create interesting shadows on the ear.
meanings.sent2: He noticed a tiny insect crawling near his anthelix.
meanings.sent3: The wind made the anthelix flap like a tiny flag on his ear.
meanings.sent4: Her anthelix resembled a small valley next to the helix mountain.
meanings.sent5: The anthelix, like a gentle slope, added character to his ear.
